Publisher : Amazound
Format : Kontakt (2.0.2+)

Description : Collection of electromechanical organs
An extensive collection of electromechanical organs specifically programmed for Kontakt. All instruments are multi-sampled in 24-bit stereo quality.

The samples contain every type: slow, fast, dirty, clean, jazz, high, low, percussion and other Hammond sounds you can imagine.

In addition to Kontakt instruments, you can use each wav sample in this library with any other compatible virtual or hardware sampler capable of loading wav files, such as the MPC.

entry.title: Dubdrops – Ragga Drops Vol.1 (WAV, MIDI, EXS, FXP, REX, SFZ, GEIST, REASON, KONG, KONTAKT, SXT)
entry.content:
Publisher : Dubdrops Website : www.producerloops.com Format : WAV, MIDI, EXS, FXP, REX, SFZ, GEIST, REASON, KONG, KONTAKT, SXT Quality : 24 bit 44.1 kHz stereo Description : A set of samples for the Drum & Bass style. Content : • 310 MB • 24-Bit/44.1kHz • 10 Drum Kits (16 sounds per kit) • 76 MIDI Grooves… Read More »

Publisher : Dubdrops
Website : www.producerloops.com
Format : WAV, MIDI, EXS, FXP, REX, SFZ, GEIST, REASON, KONG, KONTAKT, SXT
Quality : 24 bit 44.1 kHz stereo

Description : A set of samples for the Drum & Bass style.

Content :
• 310 MB
• 24-Bit/44.1kHz
• 10 Drum Kits (16 sounds per kit)
• 76 MIDI Grooves
• 37 Ready Mixed Beats
• 131 Bonus One-Shots
• 10 Reason Song Templates
• 10 Soft Sampler Patches

Additional information :
‘Ragga Drops Vol 1′ from Dub Drops is the second in this range of authentic Dub and Reggae beats.
The pack comes supplied with mixed, ready-to-drop loops and one-shot samples collected into banks
of 16 Kit sounds, ready mapped to your favorite drum samplers, complete with MIDI grooves for a
total flexible beat workout.

Since 1984 and ’til the present day, Jamaican computer beats have been rocking the world,
influencing Urban music from Hip Hop to the UK club scene and riding it ruff over the pirate radio
stations worldwide. From early digital Prince Jammy style beats to Major Lazer and Reggaeton, it’s
all represented in this new Ragga Drops series.

This is aa true Dancehall, Ragga and Bashment beats collection programmed by Horseman and mixed
by Prince Fatty. This pack hits the sample store featuring 10 rude beats with alt patterns, drops,
breakdowns and percussion ranging from 81 to 97 BPM, plus all the separate single hits and MIDI
patterns.

Single hits collection contains various versions of vintage Simmons, Casio, Oberheim DMX,
electronic percussion and many more sounds found in Digital Reggae, sampled direct from the
original machines.

‘Ragga Drops Vol 1’ features 10 Full Kits ranging from 81 to 97 BPM with multiple patterns per
kit, available as Sampler Patches and MIDI also fully programmed up for FXpansion Geist.

In detail, expect to find 310 MB of 24-Bit/44.1kHz sounds and loops, including 10 Drum Kits (16
sounds per kit), 76 MIDI Grooves, 37 Ready Mixed Beats, and 131 Bonus Drum, Percussion and SFX
sounds. This collection also features ready-to-play sampler patches for Kontakt, Halion, Geist,
N-XT, Kong, EXS24 and SFZ formats.

If you are looking for an uncompromising set of on point drum sounds matched with truly authentic
Dub and Reggae drum grooves you have come to the right place.

entry.title: Emergence Audio – Infinite Upright: Textural Ambient Piano 1.0.2 (KONTAKT)
entry.content:
Publisher : Emergence Audio Format : Kontakt (7.7.0+) Quality : Stereo 48 kHz 24 bit Description : Textured atmospheric piano We are pleased to introduce Infinite Upright , a unique piano collection created by our founder and award-winning composer Michael Vignola. Our journey began with a vintage 1980s Baldwin piano, known for its rich tone and resonance.… Read More »

Publisher : Emergence Audio
Format : Kontakt (7.7.0+)
Quality : Stereo 48 kHz 24 bit

Description : Textured atmospheric piano
We are pleased to introduce Infinite Upright , a unique piano collection created by our founder and award-winning composer Michael Vignola. Our journey began with a vintage 1980s Baldwin piano, known for its rich tone and resonance. Mike painstakingly performed and developed each sound using modular Eurorack systems and advanced digital and analog processing. Infinite Upright combines traditional piano charm with modern synthesis, offering a wide range of sounds – from soft atmospheric layers to intense, expressive harmonics.

Infinite Upright is a versatile music creation tool. Ideal for soundtracks, ambient, theme songwriting and dynamic sound design, this collection encourages artists to blend classical and contemporary styles while exploring new musical landscapes. We hope Infinite Upright will become a cornerstone of your creative process, inspiring projects and enhancing your artistic expression. Thank you for joining Emergence Audio on this journey. Let Infinite Upright open up new creative possibilities for you.

New in version 1.0.2 (from 2024-07-24) :
• Fixed: Mapping Constellations 1 mapping issue has been addressed

tags.tag: Emergence Audio - Infinite Upright: Textural Ambient Piano

entry.title: Fracture Sounds – Blueprint: Greenhead Chimes (KONTAKT)
entry.content:
Publisher : Fracture Sounds Format : Kontakt (7.0.11+) Quality : Stereo 48 kHz 24 bit Description : Playground bells The second instrument in our Blueprint series was recorded in Fracture Sounds’ hometown of Huddersfield, Greenhead Park. The team encountered difficulties recording between the quacks of ducks at dusk, but pulled through and created a library that would… Read More »

Publisher : Fracture Sounds
Format : Kontakt (7.0.11+)
Quality : Stereo 48 kHz 24 bit

Description : Playground bells
The second instrument in our Blueprint series was recorded in Fracture Sounds’ hometown of Huddersfield, Greenhead Park. The team encountered difficulties recording between the quacks of ducks at dusk, but pulled through and created a library that would influence future creations in Zen: Meditations .
Blueprint: Greenhead Chimes introduces our core Atmosphere layer mixer in Blueprint . This mixer, included in many of our libraries, contains three differently processed signals created from original samples. This expands the sonic capabilities of the instrument and makes it instantly inspiring to play.
The library is part of a framework created by the developers of Fracture Sounds , which served as the basis for creating pitched percussion in Zen: Meditations .

Interface :
• Increase to achieve greater stereo range, decrease to reduce spread in the dry audio signal
• Soften the initial transition of the dry signal – great for creating pads
• Increase damping to reduce sampling
• Control the overall level of the built-in reverb with advanced settings by clicking per gear
• Manage 4 different layers. The raw layer is the raw original samples, while the other 3 layers are the processed sounds
• Control the dynamics of the Atmosphere layers only (Modulation Wheel/CC1)
• Increase the sample start time to reduce latency. Reduce sample start time for more realism. The delay above is the right number to use a negative delay (pre-delay) in your DAW’s MIDI settings
• Increase the attack response to emphasize the volume difference between a soft and hard attack. Lower the slider to increase the soft dynamics volume

Features :
• Recorded in an outdoor children’s play area
• Up to 6 looping algorithms
• 3 custom Atmosphere layered mixer pads that can be used individually
• Sound shaping controls
• Simple and user-friendly interface
• Full NKS support: works with Komplete Kontrol

entry.title: Oblique – The Creator (KONTAKT)
entry.content:
Publisher : Oblique Format : Kontakt (6.6.1+) Quality : Stereo 48 kHz 24 bit Description : Explore an endless combination of real acoustic and analog electronic materials The concept behind The Creator is to combine different sounds and types of sounds to create something new and inspiring. With three sound sources and over 200 synths, live instruments… Read More »

Publisher : Oblique
Format : Kontakt (6.6.1+)
Quality : Stereo 48 kHz 24 bit

Description : Explore an endless combination of real acoustic and analog electronic materials

The concept behind The Creator is to combine different sounds and types of sounds to create something new and inspiring. With three sound sources and over 200 synths, live instruments and textures to choose from for each, the number of different combinations is seemingly endless.

Each of the three voices coming from The Creator has its own dedicated mix channel with gain, pan, tuning, filter, ADSR and modulation. This allows for detailed customization and experimental sound design to be carried out simultaneously.

The multi-console gives you quick access to a variety of effects, including reverb with 10 modes, using the impulse responses of hardware reverb blocks, as well as delay, drive, phaser, chorus and gain to quickly create an effect without having to download any additional plug-ins.

entry.title: Origin Sound – Glacial (MIDI, WAV)
entry.content:
Publisher : Origin Sound Website : Origin Sound Format : MIDI, WAV Quality : 24\16 bit 44.1 kHz stereo Description : “Glacial” is the latest premium library from Origin Sound – a carefully selected collection of samples containing an entire sound universe populated by cascading melodies, sublime atmospheres, rich basslines, elegant chord progressions, effects and much more.… Read More »

Publisher : Origin Sound
Website : Origin Sound
Format : MIDI, WAV
Quality : 24\16 bit 44.1 kHz stereo

Description : “Glacial” is the latest premium library from Origin Sound – a carefully selected collection of samples containing an entire sound universe populated by cascading melodies, sublime atmospheres, rich basslines, elegant chord progressions, effects and much more.

The cornerstone of this comprehensive library begins with professionally arranged drum loops. While these loops are carefully mixed and perfect for the mix, each drum loop comes as stems with percussion and treble drum sounds, as well as separate kick drum and snare grooves, giving you freedom when it comes to creating your rhythm. A variety of additional percussion loops are also included that can easily be combined with the rest of the stems. Drum loops provide great insight into how the arrangement of the 76 single drum samples included in the library was created.
In addition, “Glacial” provides a wide range of musical loops and single samples, covering all elements such as ethereal synths, unique melody lines, emotional chord progressions and signature basslines. Expect to hear instruments such as vintage synths, fluttering strings, gentle rhodos, moving guitars, cosmic vocals, ambient plucks and more. Each chord progression, bassline and melody also comes with a MIDI file, giving you the freedom to create your own sounds. 23 additional musical single samples are included for use in any samplers to effectively create your own instruments, or even for use as tonal effects throughout your mixes.

The effects presented in this library contain a range of characteristics: from organic build-ups, shimmering build-ups, to humming tones. These textures can be used in your arrangements to easily create transitions, smooth or even abrupt, or serve as an additional layer to your loops. Not to mention a large selection of bonus ambiences, which are especially useful when placed subtly in a mix as a supporting element for your crisp drum lines and warm bass lines.

“Glacial” is one of our largest libraries available with the highest audio quality. Ideal for those who want to create the illusion of a vast soundscape in their mixes.

Content :
•76 Warm drum hits
•10 Fluent drum loops (Full bounces and stem bounces)
•10 Extra perc loops
•20 Bonus lush atmospheres
•14 Thick bass Loops (including Midi files)
•17 Beautiful chord Loops (including Midi files)
•25 Atmospheric melody Loops (including Midi files)
•20 Foley infused SFX
•23 Musical one shots
•Tempos – 115PM

entry.title: Plugin Alliance & Brainworx – bx XL V3 v3.0.1 – TCD (VST, VST3, AAX) [WiN x64]
entry.content:
Year/Date of Release : 08.2024 Version : 3.0.1 Developer : Plugin Alliance Developer website : Plugin Alliance Format : VST, VST3, AAX Bit depth : 64bit Tablet : cured (TCD) System requirements : Windows 10 or later Description : bx_XL V3 allows mastering engineers to create loud mixes without compromising sound clarity. Using mid/side technology from the… Read More »

Year/Date of Release : 08.2024
Version : 3.0.1
Developer : Plugin Alliance
Developer website : Plugin Alliance
Format : VST, VST3, AAX
Bit depth : 64bit
Tablet : cured (TCD)
System requirements :
Windows 10 or later

Description :
bx_XL V3 allows mastering engineers to create loud mixes without compromising sound clarity.
Using mid/side technology from the innovative Brainworx bx_digital equalizer, you can split the mid channel into two bands (low and high frequencies).
This allows control of three separate channels – mid-low, mid-high and side, resulting in increased volume and significantly improved audio clarity
with less artifacts and greater audio clarity.

Additional information:

The Crossover Frequency slider allows you to determine where the mid-low frequency band ends and the mid-high frequency band begins. This allows you to separate out the kick drum and apply different limits to the rest of your mid-range signal—an important technique for mixes that need a strong bottom end, such as dance, rap, techno, and rock. Once the three channels of the bx_XL V3 are combined back into a stereo signal, the mix is ​​put through a true peak limiter. This means four stages of limiting, resulting in loud and crystal clear stereo mixes.
XL controls add warmth to your mixes by adding third and fifth order harmonics. A special filtering process prevents aliasing, ensuring your mixes are free of artifacts. This additional harmonic content increases perceived loudness without significantly increasing the output level of your music.
Building on the legacy of the bx_XL V2 – the first mastering limiter for mid and side frequencies, allowing individual listening of mid and side signals with phase correction using Phase-X crossover filters – the V3 includes a three-band “psychoacoustic” loudness maximizer and a host of detailed mastering meters that makes it a first-class dynamics and volume control system.

FEATURES

    • True peak limiter
    • Dual-band mid/side processing
    • Four limiting stages
    • Adjustable crossover frequency
    • Advanced Brainworx UI
    • Mono Maker
    • Sidechain circuit
    • True peak, RMS, gain reduction, LUFS, and correlation meters

TCD NOTE:

Brainworx-Plugin.Alliance.bx_XL.V3.v3.0.1-TeamCubeadooby
x64: AAX, VST3, VST2 | x86: JBridge
====================
Plugins will show under “Plugin Alliance”
Just install – Same AppID as previous release
Rock on and enjoy!
-TCD

tags.tag: Plugin Alliance & Brainworx - bx XL V3

entry.title: Render Audio – Maestro: Vintage Exploration Suit 1.0.1 (KONTAKT)
entry.content:
Publisher : Render Audio Format : Kontakt (6.6.0+) Quality : Stereo 44.1 kHz 24 bit Description : Reimagined retro synthesis Maestro is a vintage Kontakt exploration kit inspired by some of the world’s most famous analog synthesizers and effects pedals. Take advantage of Maestro’s built-in analog capabilities now and take your melodies and production to the next… Read More »

Publisher : Render Audio
Format : Kontakt (6.6.0+)
Quality : Stereo 44.1 kHz 24 bit

Description : Reimagined retro synthesis
Maestro is a vintage Kontakt exploration kit inspired by some of the world’s most famous analog synthesizers and effects pedals.
Take advantage of Maestro’s built-in analog capabilities now and take your melodies and production to the next level.
Experiment with a variety of sound source combinations and change your sound with the turn of a knob using our signature Morph Panel and Slop Engine.

Vintage set inspired by analog synths
Over 150 factory presets including bass, keyboards, brass, pads and strings
100 sound sources and 20 noise profiles inspired by classic analog synths

Built-in Features :
• Noise Profile : Choose noise level or texture to give your sound extra atmosphere
• Poly Mode : Control the polyphony of your sound
• Arpeggiator : Add arpeggiator to any sound
• Chorus : Choose from 2 chorus modes
• Slop Panel : Customize your sound using wow, flutter, mod and tape; created using a sophisticated low-frequency vibration algorithm
• Morph panel : Easily switch between multiple effects parameters to quickly change the shape of the sound
• ADSR panel : Overall control of the audio envelope
• Filter panel : Cut off unwanted high or low frequencies
• Warp knob : Add oscillating low-frequency tint to each audio source individually
• Audio Source Panel : Browse and mix multiple analog audio sources

Content :
• Bass
• Synthesizers
• Keyboards
• Pads
• Strings
• Leads
• Arpeggios

tags.tag: Render Audio - Maestro: Vintage Exploration Suit

Description  :
If you’re looking for smoky, jazzy hip-hop cuts, then this set is for you. Filled with loops of dusty live instruments, funky breaks and resampled MPC goodness, this set is a treasure trove of sampled material waiting to be discovered. The collection contains inspiring music loops of lush piano chords, abstract synths, electric piano melodies, fat drums, percussion and bass guitars, plus a large selection of one-shot samples.

Content :
249 Loops
292 One Shots

Additional information :
If you are looking for smoky, Jazz infused Hip Hop cuts the look no further than Boutique Hip Hop. Laden with dusty live instrument loops, funky drum breaks and resampled MPC goodness, this pack is a goldmine of sample material just waiting to be discovered!

Packed with character, charm and truck loads of inspirational music loops, this pristine Hip Hop sample pack features lush piano chords, abstract synth loops, deep Rhodes melodies, fat drum loops, shuffling percussion patterns, rumbling subs and live bass guitar loops plus an unprecedented package of one shot drums, instrument sounds and FX.

All sounds are 100% royalty free and are ready to download in 24 Bit Wav, Apple Loops, Rex2 and Acidized Wav file formats, with sampler instrument patches for Kontakt, EXS24, Maschine, Sonar SFZ, Mach 5, Ableton Sampler and Reason NNXT.

Publisher : Sonixinema

Description : Percussion
An innovative collection of percussion samples. Contains a unique selection of instruments such as orchestral bass drums, taiko, timpani, gongs and thunder sheets. Ideal for creating dark, cinematic soundscapes and atmospheres.

The Library was performed by world-class percussionist Joby Burgess, who is known for his virtuoso performances in blockbusters such as Black Panther, Mission: Impossible, Alien and many others. The library was recorded by Emmy Award-nominated engineer Nick Wallage, who has recorded such iconic soundtracks as Solo: A Star Wars Story. Stories”, “Wonder Woman”, “How to Train Your Dragon” and countless others.

Additional information :
Need some inspiration? Chart Topping Pop Guitars has you covered with current sounds of acoustic and electric guitar loop-able sound samples. Pop Guitars sound library runs from 110 BPM to 130 BPM – perfect for today’s Pop hits. Easily add loops to any DAW and feel the rhythms and melodies these guitars bring to the room. Add in Rock or Hip Hop beats to craft new Pop sounds. Use Pop Guitars in video to change the mood of any segment instantly. Total guitar sound count is 124 of the finest royalty free guitar loops. Each sound is recorded live, quantized, and looped to perfection.
Guitar performed and recorded by Adonis Tsilimpari.

As standard practice for all loops created by the Soundtrack Loops team, Key and BPM are tagged in both metadata and file names. Choose from Ableton Live Pack, ACIDized Wav, and Apple-looped AIFF.

The Glitch Mob is one of the most beloved live electronic artists and preeminent recording artists working today. They bring the signature sounds from their acclaimed first studio album, Drink the Sea, to your productions. Reaching number 15 on the Billboard Top Dance/Electronic Albums chart, these sounds will add some serious movement to your tracks.
